title: Acid deposition would most likely result in which

content.question: Acid deposition would most likely result in which of the following?

choices.label: The release of aluminum ions from soil
An increase in populations of mollusks
The death of species tolerant of low pH levels
An increase in buffering of lake water by sulfates
An increase in the pH of unbuffered water

content.answer: The release of aluminum ions from soil
